title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity, Q3.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing price, P4.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity, Q3.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing price, P4.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity, Q3.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing price, P4.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity, Q3.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the monopolist’s profit-maximizing price, P4.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: stating that MSC > MPC or that the MSC curve exceeds, is above, or is greater than the MPC curve.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: stating that MSC > MPC or that the MSC curve exceeds, is above, or is greater than the MPC curve.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: stating that MSC > MPC or that the MSC curve exceeds, is above, or is greater than the MPC curve.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the socially optimal quantity, Q3.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the socially optimal quantity, Q3.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the socially optimal quantity, Q3.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the dollar value of the tax, P4–P1.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the profit-maximizing quantity associated with the tax, Q2.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the dollar value of the tax, P4–P1.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the profit-maximizing quantity associated with the tax, Q2.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the dollar value of the tax, P4–P1.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the profit-maximizing quantity associated with the tax, Q2.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the dollar value of the tax, P4–P1.

1 point is earned for: correctly identifying the profit-maximizing quantity associated with the tax, Q2.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for: correctly stating that the deadweight loss increases because the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity is equal to the socially optimal quantity before the tax and is less than the socially optimal quantity after the tax.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly stating that the deadweight loss increases because the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity is equal to the socially optimal quantity before the tax and is less than the socially optimal quantity after the tax.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for: correctly stating that the deadweight loss increases because the monopolist’s profit-maximizing quantity is equal to the socially optimal quantity before the tax and is less than the socially optimal quantity after the tax.
